column4: hey i am trying to install mozilla from source. I get this error --> http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/5254
no need to build anything from source.
i used this quick howto and it works fine, http://lxer.com/module/newswire/lf/view/45917/
thanks, it worked like a charm. RESPECT!!
well you probably dont need it then :)
its mainly for audio work and things that need to run at close to realtime. no advantage over -generic for desktop use
kool.. thanks for the heads up
since we are talking about kernels.. how different is the generic kernel from the 386 kernel? I usually install the 386 kernel..
the major difference is that -generic is compiled for 586 cpus and has SMP support, -386 is compiled for 486 machines and has no smp support
hmm.. ok thanks the information again
